title: Before the Bell
description: Four real girls in a fairy's world.It’s the first day of school, and Gabby can’t wait to tell the fairies all about it. She even met a new friend who loves fairies as much as she does! But what will the Never Girls do when a fairy goes missing in Gabby’s new classroom? Tinker Bell and the Disney Fairies star in the New York Times bestselling series for readers ages 6 to 9—The Never Girls!
author: Kiki Thorpe
